Hi all,

I'm a newbie for Heritrix. So all the questions may have some simp=
le
answers.

I want to crawl on wap sites. As an example; http://wap.gezegl=
en.com

When I add a user agent with wap capabilities, like

Nokia 6300 (co=
mpatible; +http://example.com)

I can fetch some of the wap site. But here =
are the questions,

The first page of the site is;

<?xml version=3D"1.0"?>=

<!DOCTYPE wml PUBLIC "-//WAPFORUM//DTD WML 1.1//EN"
"http://www.wapforum.o=
rg/DTD/wml_1.1.xml">
<wml>
<card id=3D"c1" title=3D"Gez Eglen">
 
<onevent =
type=3D"ontimer"> <go href=3D"_index_abonedegil&mymsisdn=3D"
/></oneven=
t>

<timer value=3D"1" /><p>
Lutfen bekleyin...
<!-- <br/>Bulundugunuz yer =
kontrol edilmektedir.--></p>

</card>

</wml>


Can heritrix will follow th=
e URL on <go
href=3D"_index_abonedegil&mymsisdn=3D" /> ; cause I can't =
make it to
follow it.

Can heritrix fetch URLs from text/vnd.wap.wml docume=
nts like text/html
documents? I can't make it anyway. On what parts, must I=
 change the
settings or modules or the conf file?

Can I make a setting to =
ignore <!DOCTYPE wml PUBLIC "-//WAPFORUM//DTD
WML 1.1//EN" "http://www.wapf=
orum.org/DTD/wml_1.1.xml"> the doctype
tag and URL of it?

Thanks,

Murat
